GSD.description:
PM: core: keep irq flags in device_pm_check_callbacks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 2add538e57a2825c61d639260386f385c75e4166. For more details please see the references link.
